collection: Social Influencers: Who is impacting my brand the most?
card_description:
TOPICS
Shows the topics that are associated with your Twitter handle and/or your competitor handles. Tailor content to help boost positive brand association with these topics.

collection: Executive Pulse: How influential am I on social media versus competitors?
card_description:
KLOUT SCORE TREND
Shows the positive and negative changes in Klout scores over time for the Twitter handles shown. Identify the reasons for spikes in your Klout score trend to find ways to become more popular on social media.

collection: Executive Pulse: How influential am I on social media versus competitors?
card_description:
KLOUT SCORE
Displays the current Klout scores for the various Twitter handles representing social influence on a scale between 1-100. Make strategic social changes, if necessary, to boost your Klout score.

collection: Social Influencers: Who is impacting my brand the most?
card_description:
TOP IMPROVED INFLUENCERS
Displays the top influencers who have had the largest Klout score fluctuations on a monthly basis. Identify the reasons for influencer score changes and nourish strategic relationships.

collection: Social Influencers: Who is impacting my brand the most?
card_description:
TOP INFLUENCER SCORES
Shows the persons or companies that have had the strongest social impact for you and/or your competitors during the period. Show appreciation to your top influencers and nourish relationships.

collection: Social Influencers: Who is impacting my brand the most?
card_description:
TOP INFLUENCEES
Shows the persons or companies that are being influenced the most by the Twitter handle(s). Reach out to influencers to nourish relationships as needed.

collection: Executive Pulse: How influential am I on social media versus competitors?
card_description:
AVERAGE SCORE CHANGES
Shows the average score changes on a daily, weekly and monthly basis for the Twitter handles shown. Scores will increase as content becomes more engaging and as you acquire more followers.

collection: Executive Pulse: How influential am I on social media versus competitors?
card_description:
TOP INFLUENCERS
Shows the persons or companies that have the strongest social impact on the different Twitter handles. Reach out to influencers to nourish relationships as needed.

collection: Social Influencers: Who is impacting my brand the most?
card_description:
TOP INFLUENCER SCORE CHANGES
Displays the daily, weekly and monthly Klout score fluctuations for the top influencers. Reach out to influential individuals and nourish relationships, as needed.
